thread.title: Roger RamJet
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Roger RamJet

author: Roger RamJet
title: Roger RamJet
text: One of the many issues with Online shopping in todays world is that much like the physical shops in DK, they tend to become sloppy and very unprofessional. Not the case with this shop, this shop uses to its best ability to honour the professionalism and world class customer service by simply out performing everyone on the market. The handling time was exceptionally fast, not to mention the actual delivery. It was free shipping and hassle free. A few clicks away and the order was on its way. This is what internet shopping is all about, but with one exception that rises this shop to the top. Besides the phenomenally fast and effective delivery of the item I ordered, they also provide outstanding return policy and with very little hassle, you'd get better service online than in most shops. They have a clear format of how to run the company's front and I give my highest praises for their achievements. Then of course there is the quality of their shoes, while I'm not able to speak on behalf of all of their releases, I can say that the one I DID order was in absolute the highest quality and with the price they sold it for, no one can beat that. This was the best online experience I have had in a long time here in DK. Kudos to you Ecco for keeping the time honoured quality of customer service!
